statements: DELETE FROM GeneExpressionTracking WHERE expression_level < 50 AND time_recorded < '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
DELETE FROM gene_expression_tracking WHERE gene_id = 100 AND expression_level < 0.5;
DELETE FROM gene_metadata WHERE gene_name = 'ABC' OR gene_description LIKE '%important%';
DELETE FROM gene_expression WHERE gene_id = 100 AND timepoint < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM gene_annotations WHERE gene_name = 'Gene_A' AND description LIKE '%mutation%'
DELETE FROM ExperimentLog WHERE researcher_name = 'John Doe';
